about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm Juliano ‚Äî a software engineer who finds structure, rhythm, and creativity not only in code, but also in music, languages, juggling, and yarn arts.
about.softwareDesc: I love building reliable, elegant systems ‚Äî whether that means writing APIs, designing architectures, or crafting UI experiences that make complex ideas feel simple. My approach is grounded in pattern recognition and clear logic, yet always open to artistic intuition.
about.yarnArtsDesc: Crochet and knitting are pattern languages. Each stitch is a small instruction, like a line of code. Understanding foundations lets me replicate or adapt any design ‚Äî just like mastering the fundamentals of programming logic.
about.jugglingDesc: Siteswap notation and juggling diagrams remind me of state machines and graphs. They teach me how to break motion into data and see beauty in mathematical balance.
about.musicDesc: Music blends math and emotion ‚Äî rhythm and harmony mirror timing and architecture in software. I see every well-structured system as a kind of composition.
about.languagesDesc: Natural languages have syntax, semantics, and context ‚Äî just like programming languages. Studying their grammar and variations sharpens my sense of abstraction, inheritance, and design.
about.closing: These disciplines together shape how I design, learn, and collaborate. My goal is to build software that feels intuitive ‚Äî where technical precision meets artistic clarity.

tools.title: Tools & Experiments
tools.intro: Small utilities and experiments that reflect how I think about code, structure, and creativity. Each one connects logic from software to the beauty found in everyday patterns.
tools.stitchCounterDesc: A simple counter for crochet and knitting projects ‚Äî track stitches, rows, and progress like running an algorithm in yarn form.
tools.siteswapValidatorDesc: Input a juggling pattern and validate its Siteswap notation. A small tool that translates movement into logic and math.
tools.bpmTapDesc: Tap along to detect beats per minute or set a tempo for your music practice. A demonstration of timing precision and rhythm logic.
tools.pomodoroDesc: A focus timer that blends time management with a touch of visual harmony ‚Äî balancing productivity and flow.
tools.footerText: These are my personal tools and creative experiments ‚Äî constantly evolving as I explore new ideas and patterns.
